title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.1 - Approval by the Commission
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.1 - Approval by the Commission

State Regulations

All contests and exhibitions shall be approved in advance by
the Commission. Before approving any contest or exhibition, the Commission may
inquire into the relative merits of the combatants, their past records, and
whether or not they are suitable opponents, and the Commission may disapprove
any contest or exhibition which is not in the best interest of boxing or mixed
martial arts or of the health of any of the participants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
